text: Erik Meijs (April 20, 1991 in Zoetermeer - November 16, 2017 in Duisburg, Germany) was a Dutch male badminton player. Meijs became Dutch junior master in badminton men's single in 2010, and Dutch master in badminton men's single in 2016. He died of the wounds caused by a car accident in 2017, at the age of 26. www.focus.de == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:1991 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Dutch badminton players Category:Road accident deaths Category:Sportspeople from South Holland
title: Erik Meijs
